snippet: A plastic surgeon and an anesthesiologist whose patient died of blood loss after liposuction surgery have lost their medical licenses.    The six-member Medical Board on Wednesday revoked the licenses of the anesthesiologist, Dr. Robert K. Hoo, an...
lead_paragraph: A plastic surgeon and an anesthesiologist whose patient died of blood loss after liposuction surgery have lost their medical licenses. The six-member Medical Board on Wednesday revoked the licenses of the anesthesiologist, Dr. Robert K. Hoo, and the surgeon, Dr. W. Earle Matory. Dr. Hoo can reapply for his license late next year, though Dr. Matory may not practice for at least three years, the board ruled.
abstract: California Medical Board revokes licenses of Dr Robert K Hoo, anesthesiologist, and Dr W Earle Matory, plastic surgeon, after patient dies of blood loss following liposuction surgery (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Doctors' Licenses Taken After Liposuction Death
